Blend | Software Engineers | San Francisco & Seattle | Full-time & Internships | Onsite | https://blend.com/

Blend is a Series D fintech startup focused on improving the consumer finance industry, starting with mortgages. We partner with lenders to build a digital platform that makes the experience of buying a home more modern, transparent, and accessible to traditionally underserved customers.

We're hiring senior engineers for the following roles:

Software Engineer - Full Stack (https://bit.ly/2oXzVnG)

Software Engineer - Front End (https://bit.ly/2SxVNUG )

Software Engineer - Infrastructure (https://bit.ly/2Hw5kGQ)

Software Engineer - Automation (https://bit.ly/2yh8Vrm)

Apply directly to our job postings here: https://blend.com/careers/ or email camille@blend.com
